Translations.Text: people ask vos Hora (finis saeculum). Dictus knowledge thereof est unus DEUS! totus vos know Hora est clausum
DEUS condemned disbelievers prepared them Hell
Eternally they abide therein. They non invenit dominus nor supporter
Feria they thrown Hell they dictus Oh nos wish nos obeyed DEUS obeyed messenger
They alias dictus Noster Dominus nos obeyed noster magister dux they led nos astray
Noster Dominus dedit them double retribution curse them tremendous curse
O vos believe non est those hurt Moses tunc DEUS absolved eum de quod they dictus. He est sight DEUS prenobilis
O vos believe reverence DEUS utter unus correct utterances
He tunc fix tuus works forgive tuus sins Those obey DEUS His messenger triumphed major triumph
Nos offered responsibility (freedom de choice caelum terra montis they refused bear it est afraid de it human est accepted it he transgressing ignorant)
Pro DEUS testimentum inevitably punish hypocrite vir hypocrite femina idol worshipping vir idol worshipping femina! DEUS redeems believing VIR believing FEMINA. DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
